channel.title: Glazy Help Index
channel.description:
## Cannot register or log in
Please directly email derek [at] glazy.org and I will get back to you as soon as possible!
## Bug, Feature Request or other question
Please log into Glazy. On the home page click the "Help" button. Then describe your question or issue in the post.
![Screen Shot 2020-02-21 at 5.19.12 PM|690x335](upload://mwEybIccRrOIMAchMdGKmWhrzrD.png)
## Glazy Help in One Minute Videos
**Create a Free Glazy Account**
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ubMgitnBhOo
**User Settings & Navigation**
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ETvsshkeaVI
**Your Material Inventory**
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CDRIB2PJQFA
**Create a Material**
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Dj8391mN6VA
**Create a Recipe**
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bcN8rqt0z74
**Automatically Import Recipes**
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jMLBuBtfw4s
**Recipe Basics**
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q8-thIhLdBk
**Search for Recipes**
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HAH-7QU-TM8
**Bookmarking Recipes**
https://youtu.be/lHObxACJ_N8
**Glaze Material Substitution**
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8Yj32Yjp4m0
**Substituting Local Materials**
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FJQZSgZqK_g
**The Stull Chart**
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_cxbwkdYPYs
**Similar Recipes & Analyses**
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0iWGkC7qomE
**Posts**
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=H4u6yfGKcS0
## Index of topics for Glazy Help:
### [Support Glazy!](/t/support-glazy/) ### [About Glazy](/t/about-glazy/) ### [Getting Started](/t/getting-started-with-glazy/) ### [Materials](/t/materials-in-glazy/) ### [Recipes](/t/recipes-in-glazy/) ### [Searching Recipes](/t/searching-glazy-for-recipes/) ### [UMF (Stull) Charts](/t/umf-charts-stull-charts/820) ### [Calculator](/t/the-glazy-calculator/) ### [Inventory](/t/glazy-inventory/)
## Other Software Tools
### [Plaster Calculator](https://plaster.glazy.org) ### [Specific Gravity Calculator](https://github.com/PieterMostert/SG_calc) * [This form calculates how much water to add to a glaze to obtain a desired specific gravity.](https://pietermostert.github.io/SG_calc/html/specific-gravity-1.html) * [If your bucket of glaze is too heavy to weigh, use this instead.](https://pietermostert.github.io/SG_calc/html/specific-gravity-2.html) ([Based on calculator by Jason Bruce](https://github.com/jbruce12000/glaze-specific-gravity-calculator)) * [Brongniart's Formula](https://pietermostert.github.io/SG_calc/html/brongniart.html)
## More Help Videos
### Create & Adjust Recipes on Glazy https://vimeo.com/317512925
### Creating Analyses & Deriving Recipes on Glazy https://vimeo.com/319112294

item.title: Glazy Help Index
item.dc:creator: ceramicswiki
item.description:
Cannot register or log in

Please directly email derek [at] glazy.org and I will get back to you as soon as possible!

Bug, Feature Request or other question

Please log into Glazy. On the home page click the “Help” button. Then describe your question or issue in the post.

Specific Gravity Calculator

  • Brongniart’s Formula
